text: Kalyanji Anandji is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Balu Kiriyath, starring Mukesh, Harisree Ashokan and Annie in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Mukesh as Kalyanakrishnan * Harishree Ashokan as Anantharaman * Annie as Mary Nirmala Shivagami/Nirmala Mathew * Sukumari as Kalyanakrishnan's mother * P. C. George as Mathachan, * Cochin Haneefa as Vengalam Chakkunni / Adv. General Oorumadam Subbarama Iyer * Indrans as Maniyan * Paravoor Bharathan as Shambho Mahadevan * Jose Pallissery as Lakshminarayanan * Narendra Prasad as Shankaran * V. K. Sreeraman as Girijavallabhan * Shivaji as Seetharaman * Anila Sreekumar as Bhagyalakshmi * Kanakalatha as Lakshminarayanan's wife * Priyanka Anoop as Seetharaman's wife * Mamukkoya as Balushery Basheer * Ragini (New) as Kanakam, Girijavallabhan's wife * Philomina as Chettathi * Tony as Gopalakrishnan (Kalyanakrishnan's Friend) * Shabnam ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Kalyanji Anandji (film)
